languages.text:
The Farseer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on an enemy and makes them unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to avoid the effects.

traits.locale_text:
The Farseer inflicts slowed on an enemy makes them unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 penalty to avoid the effects.

The Farseer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on an enemy and makes them unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to avoid the effects.

The Farseer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on an enemy and makes them unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to avoid the effects.

languages.text:
先知使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，使其无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}。
目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若能通过检定，则会免除此效果。
languages.original_text:
The Farseer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on an enemy and makes them unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to avoid the effects.

traits.locale_text:
先知使目标陷入减速状态，使其无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能力量{/g}。
目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-30减值。若能通过检定，则会免除此效果。

先知使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，使其无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}。
目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若能通过检定，则会免除此效果。

languages.text:
Провидец накладывает на противника {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}, из-за чего тот не может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}.
Чтобы избежать этого эффекта, цели необходимо пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательности{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −30.
languages.original_text:
The Farseer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on an enemy and makes them unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to avoid the effects.

traits.locale_text:
Провидец накладывает на противника замедление, из-за чего тот не может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосилы{/g}.
Чтобы избежать этого эффекта, цели необходимо пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательности{/g} со штрафом −30.

Провидец накладывает на противника замедление, из-за чего тот не может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосилы{/g}.
Чтобы избежать этого эффекта, цели необходимо пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательности{/g} со штрафом −30.

languages.text:
先見司が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}減速低下{/g}効果を与えると、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使えなくなる。
その効果を避けるには、ターゲットは−30の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を課された{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。
languages.original_text:
The Farseer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on an enemy and makes them unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to avoid the effects.

traits.locale_text:
先見司が敵に速度低下の効果を与えると、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}を使えなくなる。
その効果を避けるには、ターゲットは−30のペナルティが課された{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}に合格しなければならない。

先見司が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}減速低下{/g}効果を与えると、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使えなくなる。
その効果を避けるには、ターゲットは−30の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を課された{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。

languages.text:
El vidente inflige {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} a un enemigo y le impide usar {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}.
El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −30 para evitar estos efectos.
languages.original_text:
The Farseer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on an enemy and makes them unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to avoid the effects.

traits.locale_text:
El vidente inflige ralentizado a un enemigo y le impide usar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}.
El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g} con un penalizador de -30 para evitar estos efectos.

languages.text:
Der Runenprophet belegt einen Feind mit {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} und er kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} einsetzen.
Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −30 bestehen, um die Effekte zu vermeiden.
languages.original_text:
The Farseer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on an enemy and makes them unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to avoid the effects.

traits.locale_text:
Der Runenprophet verursacht bei einem Feind Verlangsamt und er kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischen Kräfte{/g} einsetzen.
Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem Abzug von -30 bestehen, um die Effekte zu vermeiden.

languages.text:
Le Grand Prophète inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} à un ennemi, ce qui l'empêche d'utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.
La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −30 pour échapper aux effets.
languages.original_text:
The Farseer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on an enemy and makes them unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to avoid the effects.

traits.locale_text:
Le Grand Prophète inflige l'effet Ralentissement à un ennemi, ce qui l'empêche d'utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.
La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Conscience{/g} avec une pénalité de -30 pour échapper aux effets.

languages.text:
Ötesezen, bir düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlatır{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kullanamaz hâle getirir.
Hedef, bu etkilere yakalanmamak için −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Farkındalık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testinden{/g} geçmelidir.
languages.original_text:

The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to avoid the effects.
